lead_paragraph: The men were among a group of five who allegedly targeted a 20-year-old college student as punishment for accusing them of raping her before.

byline.original: By SUHASINI RAJ and ELLEN BARRY

headline.print_headline: 3 in India Are Accused of Raping Woman a Second Time
headline.main: 3 Men in India Accused of Raping Woman a Second Time

snippet: The men were among a group of five who allegedly targeted a 20-year-old college student as punishment for accusing them of raping her before....
abstract: Police in northern India arrest five men suspected of raping 20-year-old woman for second time; men allegedly first raped woman in 2013 and then raped her second time as punishment for reporting earlier assault.
